languages.text: {n}Последние слова девочки заставляют {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}вашу память{/d} всколыхнуться. Нет, наивный ребенок говорит вовсе не о пресмыкающихся... "класс", "кобры"... похоже, детское сознание исказило иные слова мертвеца: речь явно шла о пустотном корабле. Точнее — фрегате класса "Кобра".{/n}

{n}Her last phrase stirs your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}memories{/d}. No, this naive child's tale has nothing to do with reptiles... "Class," "cobras"... It seems her mind has distorted her late grandfather's words — he must have been talking about a voidship. More specifically, about a Cobra-class destroyer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Последние слова девочки заставляют {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}вашу память{/d} всколыхнуться. Нет, наивный ребенок говорит вовсе не о пресмыкающихся... "класс", "кобры"... похоже, детское сознание исказило иные слова мертвеца: речь явно шла о пустотном корабле. Точнее — фрегате класса "Кобра".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Her last phrase stirs your thoughts. No, this naive child's tale has nothing to do with reptiles... "Class," "snakes"... It seems her mind has distorted her late grandfather's words — he must have been talking about a voidship. More specifically, about a Cobra-class Imperial frigate.{/n}

{n}Her last phrase stirs your thoughts. No, this naive child's tale has nothing to do with reptiles... "Class," "snakes"... It seems her mind has distorted her late grandfather's words — he must have been talking about a voidship. More specifically, about a Cobra-class Imperial frigate.{/n}

{n}Her last phrase stirs your thoughts. No, this naive child's tale has nothing to do with reptiles... "Class," "snakes"... It seems her mind has distorted her late grandfather's words — he must have been talking about a voidship. More specifically, about a Cobra-class Imperial frigate.{/n}

{n}Her last phrase stirs your thoughts. No, this naive child's tale has nothing to do with reptiles... "Class," "snakes"... It seems her mind has distorted her late grandfather's words — he must have been talking about a voidship. More specifically, about a Cobra-class Imperial frigate.{/n}

{n}Her last phrase stirs your thoughts. No, this naive child's tale has nothing to do with reptiles... "Class," "cobras"... It seems her mind has distorted her late grandfather's words — he must have been talking about a voidship. More specifically, about a Cobra-class destroyer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}她最后那句话让你想起了{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}曾经的记忆{/d}。不对，这个天真的孩子讲的故事，恐怕与动物没什么关系……“眼镜蛇”、“鸡”……看起来，她似乎是听错了她已故祖父的话。丹兹当时指的一定是虚空舰，更确切地说，是“眼镜蛇级”驱逐舰。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her last phrase stirs your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}memories{/d}. No, this naive child's tale has nothing to do with reptiles... "Class," "cobras"... It seems her mind has distorted her late grandfather's words — he must have been talking about a voidship. More specifically, about a Cobra-class destroyer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她最后那句话引发了你的思索。不对，这个天真的孩子讲的故事，恐怕与动物没什么关系……“眼镜蛇”、“鸡”……看起来，她似乎是听错了她已故祖父的话。丹兹当时指的一定是虚空舰，更确切地说，是“眼镜蛇级”护卫舰。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Su última frase reaviva tus {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}recuerdos{/d}. No, la historia de esta niña inocente no tiene nada que ver con los reptiles... Clase y cobras... parece que su mente ha distorsionado las palabras de su abuelo: tenía que estar hablando de una nave del vacío. Concretamente, de un destructor de clase Cobra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her last phrase stirs your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}memories{/d}. No, this naive child's tale has nothing to do with reptiles... "Class," "cobras"... It seems her mind has distorted her late grandfather's words — he must have been talking about a voidship. More specifically, about a Cobra-class destroyer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Su última frase reaviva tus {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}recuerdos{/d}. No, la historia de esta niña inocente no tiene nada que ver con los reptiles... Clase y cobras... parece que su mente ha distorsionado las palabras de su abuelo: tenía que estar hablando de una nave del vacío. Concretamente, de un destructor de clase Cobra.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼女の最後の言葉が{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}引っかかった{/d}。いや、この子の話は爬虫類とは関係ない…『クラス』に『コブラ』…彼女は亡き祖父の言葉を間違って覚えたんだろう。彼はヴォイドシップについて話していたに違いない。もっと具体的に言うならば、コブラクラスのデストロイヤーのことだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her last phrase stirs your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}memories{/d}. No, this naive child's tale has nothing to do with reptiles... "Class," "cobras"... It seems her mind has distorted her late grandfather's words — he must have been talking about a voidship. More specifically, about a Cobra-class destroyer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の最後の言葉が{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}引っかかった{/d}。いや、この子の話は爬虫類とは関係ない…『クラス』に『コブラ』…彼女は亡き祖父の言葉を間違って覚えたんだろう。彼はヴォイドシップについて話していたに違いない。もっと具体的に言うならば、コブラクラスのデストロイヤーのことだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ihr letzter Satz weckt eine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Erinnerung{/d}. Nein, die Geschichte dieses naiven Kindes hat nichts mit Reptilien zu tun ... "Klasse", "Kobras" ... Offenbar hat ihr Geist die Worte ihres verstorbenen Großvaters verändert – er muss von einem Raumschiff gesprochen haben. Genauer gesagt, von einem Zerstörer der Kobra-Klasse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her last phrase stirs your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}memories{/d}. No, this naive child's tale has nothing to do with reptiles... "Class," "cobras"... It seems her mind has distorted her late grandfather's words — he must have been talking about a voidship. More specifically, about a Cobra-class destroyer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihr letzter Satz bringt dich ins Grübeln. Nein, die Geschichte dieses naiven Kindes hat nichts mit Reptilien zu tun ... "Klasse", "Kobras" ... Anscheinend hat ihr Geist die Worte ihres verstorbenen Großvaters verändert – er muss von einem Raumschiff gesprochen haben. Genauer gesagt, von einer Fregatte der Kobra-Klasse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cette dernière phrase évoque en vous des {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}souvenirs{/d}. Non, l'histoire de cette enfant naïve n'a rien à voir avec des reptiles... « Cobras », « classe »... Elle a dû déformer les paroles de son grand-père, qui devait alors parler d'un vaisseau spatial. Plus précisément d'un destroyer de classe Cobra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her last phrase stirs your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}memories{/d}. No, this naive child's tale has nothing to do with reptiles... "Class," "cobras"... It seems her mind has distorted her late grandfather's words — he must have been talking about a voidship. More specifically, about a Cobra-class destroyer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cette dernière phrase évoque en vous des {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}souvenirs{/d}. Non, l'histoire de cette enfant naïve n'a rien à voir avec des reptiles... « Cobras », « classe »... Elle a dû déformer les paroles de son grand-père, qui devait alors parler d'un vaisseau spatial. Plus précisément d'un destroyer de classe Cobra.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kızın son söyledikleri ile beraber {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}anıların{/d} tetikleniyor. Bu saf çocuğun anlattıklarının sürüngenlerle alakası yok. "Sınıf", "Kobralar"... Anlaşılan zihni, rahmetli dedesinin sözlerini çarpıtmış. Adam bir uçsuz gemisinden bahsetmiş olmalı. Daha doğrusu Kobra sınıfı bir muhripten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her last phrase stirs your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}memories{/d}. No, this naive child's tale has nothing to do with reptiles... "Class," "cobras"... It seems her mind has distorted her late grandfather's words — he must have been talking about a voidship. More specifically, about a Cobra-class destroyer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kızın son söyledikleri aklını karıştırıyor. Bu saf çocuğun anlattıklarının sürüngenlerle ilgisi yok... "Sınıf", "Kobralar"... Rahmetli dedesinin sözlerini yanlış hatırlıyor gibi gözüküyor. Adam bir uçsuz gemisinden bahsetmiş olmalı. Daha doğrusu Kobra sınıfı bir muhripten.{/n}
